oai_dc:dc.dc:title: McClung. Hugh Lawson McClung.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Knaffl & Bro., Knoxville, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Portrait of Hugh Lawson McClung (1839-1862), who was killed during the Civil War at the Battle of Fort Donelson. He as Captain of Company F, 26th Regiment Tennessee Volunteers, Army of the Confederate State of America. Photograph made by Knaffl & Bro., Knoxville, Tenn. of a daguerreotype made in 1860.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Portraits; Military personnel;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: To use photographs or to order reproductions, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8808. Please refer to Image Number if available and provide a brief description of the photograph.
